plot: Two former cowboys find themselves the opportunity to receive ransom for a wealthy banker's missing son who is safely guarded by their friend who is also the banker's former mining associate.
title: El buscabullas
plot_es: Two former cowboys find themselves the opportunity to receive ransom for a wealthy banker's missing son who is safely guarded by their friend who is also the banker's former mining associate.
plot_en: Two former cowboys find themselves the opportunity to receive ransom for a wealthy banker's missing son who is safely guarded by their friend who is also the banker's former mining associate.
